page.title: 11Tourism
page.content: Pillerton Hersey, Pillerton Priors and Fulready are set in the southern part of Warwickshire and can truly be called rural England and so for the tourist they offer the opportunity to relax in the country air. Fulready can boast one holiday house and Pillerton Priors bed and breakfast accommodation. Neither of the villages has an inn or eating house but all are within a very short drive, 2 to 3 miles of excellent country pubs. Either of these villages is an excellent spot from which to explore Stratford and Shakespeare land,Leamington Spa,. Warwick with its castle and other antiquities. Within 1 hours driving distance are the beautiful villages of the Cotswolds. Those more physically active may enjoy the many country walks.
